post.body: i was thinking how i don't mind a chilly day as long as the sun's out and not a cloud in the sky. :)
I miss going to CES. Used to go for a co I worked for. Gotta figure how to justify the biz exp now. Can u get me some freebies? ;)
Yes, Tarek was a youth minister with me at my parish here in CA. He's a great guy, and all our youth loved him.
A friend of mine started Lionheart Apparel in TX. Men's apparel for now, women's coming soon www.lionheartapparel.com
Thanks for the hydration reminders! It really helps!
It's funny... I'm expanding my social media horizons & wrapping my head around its business applications. Your interview was timely
Girlfriend, you & me both about the jury thing. Then when I get called to come in, I sit for hours in the waiting room...
jjust joined twitter today after lurking around the site for a wekk, so that article is timely! Thanks!
of course! now i can figure out where you go for lunch before i read it on yelp! ;)
Have fun in the snow! You'll fall a lot at first but snowboarding's so much fun!
It all depends on who you follow. In a short time I've encountered many positive folks here!
Twitter=therapy! I'm inspired, uplifted & encouraged daily by my twitterstream!
I was at times square NYE 06. Got there at 9pm & stood right under the ball. Best NYE ever! Thx NYPD!
I recently started using Google Reader also. I had used igoogle for certain feeds, but prefer the organization in Reader.
Hope it's "good" fast food, ya know, like noah's bagels or something. ;-) Have a happy new year!
would have joined you but i just got home & watchin news. Toast the eve of new year's eve for me!
For Twitters who regurgitate their blog on twitter, I just subscribe to their blog's rss.
has me craving choc chip cookies! But I'm holding out for our youth group party 2nite.*fingers crossed* Teens still bake, right?
Plumber came and left. Problem appears to be in the main drain, but I want another opinion. Water still backing up... grrr
Getting gas. prices are slowly creeping up again. Up 10 cents from last wk but still under $2.
Just got home from a comedy show. Plumbing at home is backed up, probably from last night's rain. Grrr...
Insurance tip - when buying a new car, consider safety to lower rates. Check IIHS top safety picks for 09 models http://tinyurl.com/blc8j
Just finished the last of my shopping online. Hope everything gets here on time.
*Yawn* Got up at 4 am to attend mass at 5, a Filipino tradition called Simbang Gabi or Misa de Gallo. http://tinyurl.com/22ybnz - Day 3 of 9
In this last week of shopping, stay safe both online and at the mall! Here are tips from the IINC: http://tinyurl.com/44vf9x
It's the end of another work day. Gonna get home to work on decorating the house and tree!
http://bit.ly/hpWh 10 Twitter Agendas - What’s Yours? I'm still figuring out my twitter agenda, but so far.... welcome to my tent!
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
Going to see Nutcracker tonight w/ my sister & aspiring-2 yr. old-ballerina niece. I've never seen it before so I'm looking forward to it!
http://twitpic.com/z320 - Checking out rose parade floats!
http://twitpic.com/ytrh - Shopping at 3rd street promenade in sant
Made it to the Los Angeles area in 5 hrs! Got caught up in some dense fog on I-5 but otherwise smooth sailing!
Happy New Year! Getting ready for the drive to SoCal in a few hours. Meanwhile, here's my 1st yelp review of '09 http://tinyurl.com/7yfk32
Be careful on the roads tomorrow! New Year's is more hazardous for pedestrians than drivers http://tinyurl.com/7s6ere
Tomorrow's Rose Parade - Watch for the Farmers Insurance float, featuring '25 Cadillac Phaeton = 1st car insured: http://tinyurl.com/7rkl7e
The Governator Takes to Twitter and Widgets to Pass California Budget http://tinyurl.com/887vax
Just drove by what used to be the local ice skating rink. It looks like it's now a pizza place!
RT @jonathanmead Press the reset button on your life:http://tinyurl.com/9nyk74
Meeting friends at Santana Row and found parking right away! :-)
Just got home from the movies... Marley & me was a cute movie - true story. Bring kleenex!
